remarks: No subspace is smaller than the zero subspace.  ( ~ shle0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 20-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lss0cl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lss0cl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssle0 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. S ) -> ( X C_ { .0. } <-> X = { .0. } ) ) $.
